name: Fast Jump
description:
Fast Jump: It is an action game in which you must move quickly to stay alive. Teleport between platforms and shoot all monsters you encounter along the way. Power-ups will help you, as long as you know how to use them. In every mission you will have a boss for you to defeat.

Features:


  • Have fun shooting at different monsters;
  • With an engaging soundtrack, several independent songs;
  • Different missions and bosses that get more and more difficult;
  • Two game modes: Campaign and Adventure;
  • Fun power-ups that will help you defeat the monsters;
  • Multiple characters for you to unlock;
